text:
Charge 4 USB Devices Simultaneously While Giving Your MacBook Air a Rest [Deals Hub[ Posted by StackSocial on Feb 11,   29 
The MacBook Air is the perfect laptop to take anywhere, but sometimes its lack of ports can be a pain. Fix that problem the the 4-Port USB Hub MacBook Air Stand. It’s on sale now in the iPhone Hacks Deals Hub . 
This stand is the perfect accessory to declutter your workspace to increase your productivity no matter where you’re working from. With a minimalist design and four USB ports that can charge any USB compatible device, it’s the perfect accessory for at home or on the go. Plug in just about anything and instantly give it a boost while providing yourself flexibility in your work space. 
You can get the 4-Port USB Hub MacBook Air Stand on sale now from the iPhone Hacks Deals Hub for just $31.99. That’s a savings of 67% off the retail price. It’s a can’t miss deal for a productivity-boosting accessory, so grab this deal today! Like this post? Share it!
